lines: Hear the pennies dropping! Listen while they fall.
Every one to Jesus, -He will get them all.
Dropping, dropping dropping, dropping; Hear the pennies fall!
Every on for Jesus,-He will get them all
Dropping, dropping ever, From each little hand;
`Tis our gift to Jesus, From his little band.
Now, while we are little, Pennies are our store;
But, when we are older, Lord, we’ll give thee more.
Tho` we’ve little money, We can give him love;
He will own our off`ring, Smilling from above.
